events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it promptly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further processing.
A recruiter specialized in software engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps.
We conducted an initial screening of your background to assess your fit for the software engineer developer role.
Thank you for your prompt response and for providing additional details about your engineering experience.
Your technical interview for the software engineer role has been scheduled with our development team next week.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong programming and problem-solving skills.
We have scheduled an HR interview to discuss your fit with our company culture and benefits package.
The HR interview was completed with positive feedback regarding your alignment with company values.
An official offer for the Software Engineer position was sent including compensation and onboarding details.
We received your affirmative feedback expressing excitement about joining our engineering team.
You have accepted the Software Engineer position offer. We look forward to working together.
Your onboarding process has officially started with access to all required developer tools and resources.
The recruitment process is now complete and you are officially hired as part of our software engineering team.
